text: INCLUSIVE ECONOMY AND GOOD GROWTH Supporting text 15.44 LBTH’s Employment Land Review (2023) and Affordable Workspace Study (2023) identify a gap in the affordability of commercial space within the borough for many types of businesses. In accordance with the London Plan, affordable commercial space is intended to support: (1) specific sectors that have social value such as charities, voluntary and community organisations or social enterprises; (2) specific sectors that have cultural value such as creative and artists’ workspace, rehearsal and performance space and makerspace; (3) disadvantaged groups starting up in any sector; (4) educational outcomes through connections to schools, colleges or higher education; and (5) start-up and early stage businesses or regeneration.
